story: I love to play lottery. It gives me a peace of mind. I love playing Daily 3 and Scratch-Offs. It gives me joy!
Nice to hit a prize once in a while and fantabulous when I win!
I play every day, Daily 3 and Scratch-offs. I love the Indiana lottery!
My family has always played them and it’s just fun to sit with everyone, scratch and see what we win!
I can choose the game that I can afford at the time. I was on the Hoosier Millionaire Show two times and loved it.
It’s fun! I never expect to win, but when I do it’s exciting.
I’m glad that I can be a small part of helping the whole state civil workers.
I enjoy the game tickets such as bingo and the crosswords. It’s entertaining with a chance to win money!
I have played the lottery for years. It is fun and relaxing after a hard day’s work.
It’s exciting, for a chance to win big cash for something fun like a vacation!
I enjoy putting my money back into the lottery funds to help fellow Hoosiers!
I love to play the lottery for the excitement and anticipation it brings to my day!
I love playing the Scratch-offs, and I can give them to family and friends for birthdays and holidays.
I have been playing ever since Indiana started their lottery, and I find it exciting to play responsibly while trying to win a life changing amount.
It’s exciting to play! I love the huge variety of different games! Always something new and fun to play!
